Package paintingcanvas

Class App

  • java.lang.Object
    • paintingcanvas.App
  • public class App
extends java.lang.Object

    Hi person leafing through the documentation! This class is only really still here because i was too lazy to try and integrate everything with Canvas.CanvasComponent. You can use this to make your animations and stuff, but you should really use the Canvas class

    You know, actually, the canvas object only really exists to pretend that theres some object youre calling this stuff on when in reality its all static under the hood.

    So thats why it breaks if you make two canvases.

    Or does it? IDK i haven't tested it.
